name: Prisoner of the Past: Deed of Fate

skills.name: Destined Punishment
skills.description: [SP: 0][CD: 0] The weapon active's CD, max charges, and effects are based on wielder type. After using Weapon Active Skill, summon 4 lightning butterflies around the valkyrie. After she deals Lightning DMG, the butterflies will fly towards enemies, each causing 360.0% ATK of Lightning DMG. Lightning DMG of host +16.0% for 30.0s against the enemies hit by the butterflies. The effect can be triggerd only once every 10s.

skills.name: Redemption In Vain
skills.description: When using Weapon Active Skill, Lightning DMG +25.0% for 30s(can be refreshed). If wielded by Disciplinary Perdition, Thunderstorm during [Foreseer's Sin] additionally deals 45.0% ATK of Lightning DMG.

skills.name: Conceited Words Of Pity
skills.description: Self Lightning DMG +15.0%. If wielded by Disciplinary Perdition, Total DMG of Ult +30.0%.
